title: Strengthening Instructional Competencies: Long-Term Physical Education Teacher Professional Development Focused on Life Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Apply and refine a physical education lesson design framework for integrating life skills three or more times.
Develop two or more creative lesson models through PBL activities with peer teachers.
Share educational practice cases at least twice monthly using online collaboration tools (e.g., chat rooms).
Revise and improve lesson execution strategies four or more times based on reflective journals.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
